item.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang Is Bananas for Google Gemini’s AI Image Generator
item.description: The Nvidia CEO reveals his consuming love for Google’s image generator, the artsy side of Grok, and what exactly he uses Perplexity, Gemini, and ChatG...

item.title: Samsung HW-Q990F Soundbar System Review: Glorious Atmos
item.description: Samsung's flagship soundbar system sounds as excellent as ever, filling rooms with massive Dolby Atmos goodness.

item.title: Apple iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max Review: Level Up
item.description: Big, beefy batteries mean you might not have to charge your iPhone every day anymore.

item.title: Apple iPhone Air Review: Better Than Expected
item.description: The ultrathin iPhone Air is better than you’d expect, but it still costs too much for just a slim frame.

item.title: WIRED’s Best E-Readers, Tested and Reviewed (2025): Kindle, Kobo, Boox
item.description: These WIRED-tested ebook readers let you take your library anywhere.
